text: Farris is an unincorporated community in Hubbard County, in the U.S. state of Minnesota. ==History== A post office called Graceland was established in 1887, the name was changed to Farris in 1898, and the post office closed in 1915. Farris was a station on the Great Northern and Soo railroads. ==References== Category:Former municipalities in Minnesota Category:Unincorporated communities in Hubbard County, Minnesota Category:Unincorporated communities in Minnesota
title: Farris, Minnesota
